Module com.vexed.vexed

Package com.comp2059.app.model

package com.comp2059.app.model
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    AbstractFactory
    Create abstract classes for the Bullet and Shuttle objects to get the factory.
    Asteroid
    This is Asteroid class.
    Background
    This is Background class, responsible for defining background of game stage according to the background type users determine.
    Explosion
    This is Explosion class, responsible for create explosion and control the place of explosion.
    FactoryProducer
    This class is a factory generator to get corresponding factory by passing bullet or shuttle information.
    GameObjects
    This is a parent class of all classes what the game can see, including their image, place, size and stage.
    GameStageModel
    This class uses singleton pattern to process game stage data from game stage view, including update the shuttle's blood point, asteroid fall speed and so on in real time.
    Ranking
    This class is to store, select and display ranking by using sqlite.
    Role
    This is an abstract class inheriting GameObjects, objects that will spawn and disappear will inherit this clas.
